personalInfo.family: Wife, Valerie; Charlotte Katie (7/28/10), Samantha Taylor (9/2/13)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Missed the cut at the Utah Championship, his only start on the Web.com Tour...Finished 139th at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.

2013: Advanced to the weekend at the Utah Championship, his only Web.com Tour start, and finished T55. Was a Monday qualifier outside Salt Lake City, not far from his home.
 
2010: Made the cut at the Albertsons Boise Open, one of two Web.com Tour starts during the year.

2009: Made the cut in one of four Web.com Tour starts, a T20 at the Stonebrae Classic...Made three cuts in three starts on PGA TOUR Canada but did not crack the top-25 in any week. 

2008: Made the cut in two of three starts on the Web.com Tour. Received a sponsor exemption into the Utah Championship, where he T8. His top-25 effort gained him a start the following week at the Albertsons Boise Open...Went on to T6 in Idaho after posting a 63 in the final round at Hillcrest CC...Earned another start, at the Oregon Classic, where he T29. Posted sub-par scores in nine of his 12 rounds during that stretch...Was three for three on PGA TOUR Canada and had three top-25 finishes. Best week was a T4 at the Times Colonist Open. Also was T14 at the Saskatchewan Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: High school team won the state championship four times, and he won the individual championship twice...Won the 2005 U.S. Public Links Championship that earned him a spot in the 2006 Masters, where he missed the cut...Played on the 2006 U.S. Palmer Cup team.
tourBios.personal: Attended Davis High School in Kaysville, Utah, the same school that produced PGA TOUR player Daniel Summerhays...Brother, Cole, won the 2013 Utah State Amateur title...Has been a UPS package runner during the holidays...Biggest golf thrill was playing in the 2006 Masters...Augusta National is the favorite course he's played...Favorite pro teams are the Utah Jazz and San Francisco 49ers...Favorite TV show is "Friends."...Favorite food is Mexican...If not a professional golfer, says he would be a stay-at-home dad...Twitter name is @ogdenclay.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T6th in 2008 at the Albertsons Boise Open Pres'd by Kraft.
